Description: It's relatively cheap price, yet comfort and reliability, made the Covet and extremely popular vehicle during it's production. In celebration of one million Covets being built, Ibishu released the 'Anniversary Edition' of the Covet for a limited time. All Anniversary Edition Covets were painted in exclusive 'Scarlet Red' and given painted bumpers, Ibishu Suprema alloy wheels were equipped, and the GT exhaust was fitted.
